/* eslint-disable template-curly-spacing */
 
import {css} from "emotion";
import {isString} from "lodash";
 
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import getButtonVars from "./button.var";
import {getLuminance,solidifyOpacity,makeReadable,unitMath} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
 
function getButtonVariationStyles(variation,buttonVars) {
 
  const {
    getColor,
    getHoverColor,
    getFocusColor,
    getDownColor,
    getActiveColor,
    getLightColor,
    getLightHoverColor,
    getLightDownColor,
    getLightFocusColor,
    getLightActiveColor,
    firstReadableColor,
    basicInvertedBoxShadow,
    white,
    invertedTextShadow,
    invertedBorderSize,
    coloredBoxShadow,
    basicColoredBorderSize,
    basicBorderSize,
  } = buttonVars;
 
  const color = getColor(variation);
  const isVeryDark = getLuminance(color) < 0.02;
  const lightColor = isVeryDark ? "#ffffff" : getLightColor(variation);
  const colorHover = getHoverColor(variation);
  const colorFocus = getFocusColor(variation);
  const colorDown = getDownColor(variation);
  const colorActive = getActiveColor(variation);
  const lightColorHover = isVeryDark ? "rgba(255,255,255,0.2)" : getLightHoverColor(variation);
  const lightColorDown = isVeryDark ? "rgba(255,255,255,0.1)" : getLightDownColor(variation);
  const lightColorActive = isVeryDark ? "#ffffff" : getLightActiveColor(variation);
 
  // const lightColorTextColor = textColor;
  const lightColorFocus = isVeryDark ? "rgba(255,255,255,0.3)" : getLightFocusColor(variation);
 
  const defaultStyle = css`
    & {
      background-color: ${color};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(color,["#fff",makeReadable(color,color)])};
      text-shadow: ${invertedTextShadow};
    }
 
    & {
      box-shadow: ${coloredBoxShadow};
    }
 
    &:hover,&.active:hover {
      background-color: ${colorHover};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(colorHover)};
      text-shadow: ${invertedTextShadow};
    }
 
    &:focus {
      background-color: ${colorFocus};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(colorFocus)};
      text-shadow: ${invertedTextShadow};
    }
    &:active {
      background-color: ${colorDown};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(colorDown)};
      text-shadow: ${invertedTextShadow};
    }
    &.active:active,
    &.active {
      background-color: ${colorActive};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(colorActive)};
      text-shadow: ${invertedTextShadow};
    }
  `;
  const basicStyle = css`
    /* Basic */
    & {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${basicBorderSize} ${color} inset !important;
      color: ${makeReadable(color)} !important;
    }
    &:hover {
      background: transparent !important;
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(basicColoredBorderSize,"+","1px")} ${colorHover} inset !important;
      color: ${makeReadable(colorHover)} !important;
    }
    &:focus {
      background: transparent !important;
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(basicColoredBorderSize,"+","1px")} ${colorFocus} inset !important;
      color: ${makeReadable(colorHover)} !important;
    }
    &.active {
      background: transparent !important;
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(basicColoredBorderSize,"+","2px")} ${colorActive} inset !important;
      color: ${makeReadable(colorDown)} !important;
    }
    &:active {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(basicColoredBorderSize,"+","2px")} ${colorDown} inset !important;
      color: ${makeReadable(colorDown)} !important;
    }
    ${'' /* .ui.buttons:not(.vertical) > .basic.color.button:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: -${basicColoredBorderSize};
    } */}
  `;
  const invertedStyle = css`
    /* Inverted */
    & {
      background-color: transparent;
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${invertedBorderSize} ${lightColor} inset !important;
      color: ${lightColor};
    }
 
    &:focus,
    &.active,
    &:active {
      box-shadow: none !important;
    }
    &:hover {
      background-color: ${lightColorHover};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(solidifyOpacity(lightColorHover,"#000000"))};
    }
    &:focus {
      background-color: ${lightColorFocus};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(solidifyOpacity(lightColorFocus,"#000000"))};
    }
    &.active,
    &.active:active,
    &.active:focus
    {
      background-color: ${lightColorActive};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(solidifyOpacity(lightColorActive,"#000000"))};
    }
    &:active {
      background-color: ${lightColorDown};
      color: ${firstReadableColor(solidifyOpacity(lightColorDown,"#000000"))};
    }
  `;
  const basicInvertedStyle = css`
    /* Inverted Basic */
    & {
      background-color: transparent;
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedBoxShadow} !important;
      color: ${white} !important;
    }
    &:hover {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(invertedBorderSize,"+","1px")} ${lightColorHover} inset !important;
      color: ${lightColor} !important;
    }
    &:focus {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(invertedBorderSize,"+","1px")} ${lightColorFocus} inset !important;
      color: ${lightColor} !important;
    }
    &.active {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(invertedBorderSize,"+","2px")} ${lightColorActive} inset !important;
      color: ${lightColor} !important;
    }
    &:active {
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px ${unitMath(invertedBorderSize,"+","2px")} ${lightColorDown} inset !important;
      color: ${lightColor} !important;
    }
  `;
 
  return {defaultStyle,basicStyle,invertedStyle,basicInvertedStyle};
}
 
export default styleMemoize((variation,{siteOverrides,overrides} = {})=>{
 
  const buttonVars = getButtonVars({siteOverrides,overrides});
 
  const {
    defaultStyle,
    basicStyle,
    invertedStyle,
    basicInvertedStyle,
  } = getButtonVariationStyles(variation,buttonVars,{siteOverrides,overrides});
 
 
  return css`
    label: ${isString(variation) ? variation : "custom"}-button;
 
    &,
    body .cm-button-group &
    { ${defaultStyle} }
 
    &.basic,
    body .cm-button-group &.basic,
    body .cm-button-group.basic &
    { ${basicStyle} }
 
    body .cm-button-group & {
      border:none;
    }
    ${'' /* body .cm-button-group:not(.vertical) &:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: -1px;
    }
    body .cm-button-group.vertical &:not(:first-child) {
      margin-top: -1px;
    } */}
 
    &.inverted,
    body .cm-button-group &.inverted
    body .cm-button-group.inverted &
    { ${invertedStyle} }
 
    &.basic.inverted,
    body .cm-button-group &.basic.inverted,
    body .cm-button-group.inverted &
    { ${basicInvertedStyle} }
 
  `;
});
 
export const buttonGroupVariationStyle = styleMemoize((variation,buttonClass,{siteOverrides,overrides} = {})=>{
 
  const buttonVars = getButtonVars({siteOverrides,overrides});
 
  const {
    defaultStyle,
    basicStyle,
    invertedStyle,
    basicInvertedStyle,
  } = getButtonVariationStyles(variation,buttonVars,{siteOverrides,overrides});
 
  return css`
 
    & .${buttonClass} { ${defaultStyle} }
    &.basic {
       & .${buttonClass} { ${basicStyle} }
    }
    &.inverted .${buttonClass} { ${invertedStyle} }
    &.basic.inverted .${buttonClass} { ${basicInvertedStyle} }
 
 
    ${'' /* &.basic {
      border:none;
    }
 
    &.basic .${buttonClass} {
      border: none;
    }
    &.basic:not(.vertical) .${buttonClass}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: -1px;
    }
    &.basic.vertical .${buttonClass}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-top: -1px;
    } */}
 
  `;
});
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
